summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on creating affordable, innovative products like smartphones and IoT devices. With a mission to deliver technology for a better life globally, Xiaomi emphasizes quality, affordability, and innovation. Their three core tenets are technology-driven, cost-effective products, and a commitment to being cutting-edge. Xiaomi's future strategies include redefining entrepreneurship, integrating the internet with manufacturing, and ensuring steady progress. Positioned to lead in smart living and manufacturing advancements, Xiaomi aims to shape the future with innovative solutions and global impact.
